participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and social, enjoys engaging with others but struggles with commitment in relationships.
participant_1.background: i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i have never had a steady relationship. i like to spend my money on cars. i work from home.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and passionate about nature, finds joy in simple pleasures like music and horseback riding.
participant_2.background: i help tend the fields. i like to listen to rock music while working. i like to ride horses. i have three arabian horses. my father is a farmer.
